definitions.meaning:
拥护共和政体的人；共和主义者
a person who supports a form of government with a president and politicians 
elected by the people with no king or queen

（美国）共和党党员，共和党的支持者
a member or supporter of the Republican Party of the US

北爱尔兰共和主义者（认为北爱尔兰应脱离英国回归爱尔兰共和国）
a person from Northern Ireland who believes that Northern Ireland should be part of the Republic of Ireland and not part of the United Kingdom

共和国的；共和政体的；拥护共和政体的
connected with or like a republic ; supporting the principles of a republic
（美国）共和党的connected with the Republican Party in the US

北爱尔兰共和主义者的；支持北爱尔兰共和主义者的
connected with or supporting the Republicans in Northern Ireland
